metadata.title: CVE-2015-6628 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Media Framework in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48Z and 6.0 before 2015-12-01allows attackers to obtain sensitive information, and consequently bypassan unspecified protection mechanism, via unknown vectors, as demonstratedby obtaining Signature or SignatureOrSystem access, aka internal bug24074485.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
